outputs.output_descr:
The support given to the EACC is to implement the identified outcomes below which are a Key aspect of Chapter Six of the Kenyan Constitution which deals with Leadership and Integrity. 
1. Legal and policy framework for effective and efficient wealth declaration reviewed 
2. An effective wealth declaration management system established by EACC
3. Capacity of EACC for asset tracing and recovery enhanced 
4. Effective public reporting and participartion in wealth declaration established

project_descr: Support to Ethics and Anti Corruption Commission(EACC) formally known as Kenya Anti Corruption Commission (KACC) to reduce corruption risk in Kenya through welath declarations of public officers
